Class EditUserProfileController

java.lang.Object
musicApp.controllers.ViewController<EditUserProfileView>
musicApp.controllers.EditUserProfileController
All Implemented Interfaces:
EditUserProfileView.EditUserProfileViewListener
public class EditUserProfileController extends ViewController<EditUserProfileView> implements EditUserProfileView.EditUserProfileViewListener
The type Playlist edit controller.
